com.ibm.jaggr.core.module

Interface IModuleCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModuleCacheImpl

    public interface IModuleCache
extends Serializable
    Interface for module cache object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MODULECACHEINFO_PROPNAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Remove all modules in the cache
      boolean contains(String key)
      Returns true if the module with the specified key is in the cache
      void dump(Writer writer, Pattern filter)
      Output the cache info to the specified Writer
      IModule get(String key)
      Returns the module with the specified key, or null if the module with the specified key is not in the cache
      Future<ModuleBuildReader> getBuild(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, IModule module)
      Returns a future to the build reader for requested module.
      Set<String> getKeys()
      Returns the set of keys associated with entries in the cache
      void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
      Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for this cache.
      int size()
      Returns the number of entries in the layer cache

    • Field Detail

      • MODULECACHEINFO_PROPNAME

        static final String MODULECACHEINFO_PROPNAME

    • Method Detail

      • get

        IModule get(String key)
        Returns the module with the specified key, or null if the module with the specified key is not in the cache
        Parameters:
        key - the module key
        Returns:
        the requested module or null

      • getBuild

        Future<ModuleBuildReader> getBuild(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                 IModule module)
                                   throws IOException
        Returns a future to the build reader for requested module. If the build already exists in the cache, then a completed future for the reader to the cached build is returned. Otherwise, a new build is started, and a future that will complete when the build has finished is returned.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object
        module - the module to build
        Returns:
        a Future to the build reader for the module
        Throws:
        IOException

      • contains

        boolean contains(String key)
        Returns true if the module with the specified key is in the cache
        Parameters:
        key - the module key
        Returns:
        true if the specified module is in the cache

      • clear

        void clear()
        Remove all modules in the cache

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of entries in the layer cache
        Returns:
        the number of entries

      • getKeys

        Set<String> getKeys()
        Returns the set of keys associated with entries in the cache
        Returns:
        the key set

      • dump

        void dump(Writer writer,
        Pattern filter)
          throws IOException
        Output the cache info to the specified Writer
        Parameters:
        writer - the target Writer
        filter - Optional filter argument
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setAggregator

        void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
        Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for this cache. Note that the aggregator may not be fully initialized at the time that this method is called and some aggregator methods (like IAggregator.getConfig() may return null if called from within this method.
        Parameters:
        aggregator - The aggregator instance for the cache
